fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Pick Up Item**: Pick up an item, giving the Minecraft(Head) role one item of your choice(1 uses)
**Play Jukebox**: Play a random music theme. This theme will be posted at the start of the next day, and you unlock the Dance! Ability till the end of the next night.
**Dance!**: Dance, roleblocking five players of your choice due to how cute you are.
**Follow!**: Learn who a player visits and their role. The player will be informed that they have been followed by an Allay.
**Farm Crystal!**: Farm a crystal, giving a Amethyst Shard to the current Minecraft(Head) role.
**Retrieve!**: Give the Minecraft(Head) role a previously used item of your choosing.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Owners Sense**: You are unaffected by all actions on players you follow tonight
**Old Times**: If you are jailed, you die at the end of the night.
**Panicked State**: You have a one time basic scum shield. If attacked, you enter a panicked state, and your ability targets random players tonight. While panicked, you cannot Play Jukebox or Farm Crystal.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value: **Drop Item**: If you are killed, the head role gains a random minecraft item.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay all else and turn them into gear
